channel.title: 508 server help
channel.description:
Hello, How to run a 508.
I have readed the tut's :
How to setup a 508 ?
i did done all good. Downloaded server,client. Where to run? its in ''CMD'' ''RUN?'' Well if i click run, it says ''Cannot find notepad'' or something. ( its saying in dutch)
Please help me. Thanks!
